global_caption: a scene featuring an old man wearing a black beret and a gray cardigan over a white shirt, also wearing navy pants and black shoes, a woman wearing a flower-covered white dress who is smiling and is 25 years old, a 30-year-old man wearing a blue shirt and beige shorts and black slippers, holding a brown basket with his right hand and a tray with 20 bottles of water on it with his left hand, and a young girl wearing a pink tank top and a white skirt and pink sneakers, holding a brown teddy bear with her right hand and holding a yellow balloon with her left hand
